Key Match Events: Alexis Mac Allister scored a goal three minutes after half-time to break the deadlock
Julian Alvarez doubled the lead in the 84th minute with a thumping shot from outside the area
Paulo Dybala put the seal on the victory with a late strike in stoppage time
Pre-Game Insights: Lionel Messi and Angel Di Maria, who retired from international football after the Copa America triumph in July, were missing from the Argentina team
Post-Match Reflections: The win tightened Argentina's grip on South America's 2026 World Cup qualifying tournament
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at the Estadio Monumental in Buenos Aires
Others: Argentina lead South America's 10-team round-robin qualifying table by five points after seven games
The top six teams in the final standings qualify automatically for the 2026 finals in North America with the seventh-placed team advancing to a playoff
